delete.summary: Deletes an Action Description by id

get.summary: Get ErpRoles by approver name and system id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the unique identifier of the RoleApprover to delete

requestBody.description: The payload needed to create it

get.summary: Gets role approvers for specified ERP system and, optionaly, role. WARNING: This endpoint is needed for legacy jobs, like User to Role, Role to TCode, etc.. Please do not use this endpoint in all other cases and use OData instead.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the unique identifier of the  Role Owner to delete

requestBody.description: The payload needed to create it

get.summary: Gets role owners for specified ERP system and, optionaly, role. WARNING: This endpoint is needed for legacy jobs, like User to Role, Role to TCode, etc.. Please do not use this endpoint in all other cases and use OData instead.
Exports all ERP roles for specified ERP system.
Exports all ERP users for specified ERP system.
Gets all user groups available for specified ERP system.

post.summary: Initiates a request to refresh stagedata for specified ERP system.

get.summary: Exports the roles stored for a particular system into a xlsx file.
